Description: Log-transformed frequencies of all cell types
Log-transformed frequencies of significant cell types only
Calculation Method: Log transformation of raw frequencies for significant cells only
Components: {col}_log for significant cell types (ILC Precursors, Plasmacytoid DC, Transitional Mono, Reg Myeloid, TCRγδ, Treg)

Description: Log ratios between cell types with significant correlations
Calculation Method: Log(cell1) - Log(cell2) for significantly correlated pairs

Description: Log ratios between significant cell types with significant correlations
Calculation Method: Log(cell1) - Log(cell2) where both cells are significant
Components: {cell1}_{cell2}_logratio where both cells are in the significant cell types list

Description: Log ratios between ALL possible cell type pairs
Calculation Method: Log(cell1) - Log(cell2) for ALL possible cell type pairs (including correlated pairs)
Components: {cell1}_{cell2}_allpair_logratio for all possible cell type pairs}

Description: Interaction terms between cell types with significant correlations
Calculation Method: cell1 * cell2 for significantly correlated pairs

Description: Interaction terms between significant cell types with significant correlations
Calculation Method: cell1 * cell2 where both cells are significant
Components: {cell1}_{cell2}_interaction where both cells are in the significant cell types list

Description: Interaction terms between ALL possible cell type pairs
Calculation Method: cell1 * cell2 for ALL possible cell type pairs (including correlated pairs)
Components: {cell1}_{cell2}_allpair_interaction for all possible cell type pairs}

Description: Significant cell type frequencies plus interactions between significant cells
Significant cell type frequencies plus ratios between significant cells
Significant cell type frequencies plus all correlation interactions
Significant cell type frequencies plus all correlation ratios
All cell type frequencies plus correlation-derived interactions
All cell type frequencies plus interactions between all possible cell type pairs
All cell type frequencies plus correlation ratios
All cell type frequencies plus all possible pairwise ratios
Interaction terms from task-specific correlations
Calculation Method: cell1 * cell2 for pairs specifically correlated in the given task

Description: Log ratios from task-specific correlations
Calculation Method: Log(cell1) - Log(cell2) for pairs specifically correlated in the given task

Description: Log-transformed frequencies of cells involved in task-specific correlations
Calculation Method: Log transformation of raw frequencies for cells in task-specific correlations
Components: {col}_log for cell types involved in task-specific correlations

Description: Significant cell type frequencies plus task-specific correlation interactions
Significant cell type frequencies plus task-specific correlation ratios
